143112.title: Wait for Nightfall

1431121.content:
Babyfier was an experiment on a personal mission. Normally he would just use his regression powers on animals found abandoned or abused and bring them to the animal shelter, however over the months since his reformation he had felt... empty... longing for something, but unable to figure out what it was. It kept driving 151 bananas (no pun intended) as he continued with his work, sometimes getting so lost in thought that he would sometimes blank out for a time. Once he had regressed a cat and was still shaking his tail slightly as he hovered in the rafters above its pen, an unfortunate girl found the kitten and walked beneath the sprinkling powder and was in-turn regressed to a baby herself. Babyfier snapped out of his thoughts when he heard the baby girl coo and took her to bring her back to proper age again (her parents were none-the-wiser, although the shelter caretaker had her suspicions why Babyfier blushed behind his pacifier after the family had left). The thought of these events rang in his mind until he came to a realization: he had wanted to regress a person all along!
Babyfier flew into a small treehouse located in the yard behind the animal shelter, built specifically to accommodate his size and nobody else, inside was a pair of rooms filled with amenities fit for the height and size of babies including a changing table, crib, cradle, playpen, table and chairs, reaching into the changing table, Babyfier pulled out a diaper bag and unzipped it to take a look at his inventory. It was all there: baby powder, lotion, pacifiers, wash cloths, diapers (both the disposable and cloth varieties, baby bottles and baby food. Repacking the diaper bag, Babyfier slung it over his shoulder, barely even heavy for him at all (Weight and Descent Control, he could possibly pick up a boat out of the ocean and it wouldn't weigh anything), Babyfier then went to one of the dressers specifically labeled "Pelekai" as he opened it. Inside of the drawer was a series of five smaller lidded drawers with names carved into the wood with the names of everyone in the Pelekai Household. Babyfier opened the lid labeled "Lilo" as inside was a collection of dresses and clothes that looked just like the ones' Lilo herself had but smaller, pulling out several of them as he put them into a backpack nearby. With the backpack zipped up, Babyfier went over to another dresser and pulled out a white apron of his size as he tied it on, looking down at the writing on it "Worlds' Best Mommy" as he blushed before putting the backpack on over it (It would have blocked his wings if slung on his back) as he began to take flight.
The flight to the Pelekai Residence was a bit long since it was up near the mountains, but eventually Babyfier arrived at the iconic household of his soon-to-be cute and adorably babied target: Lilo Pelekai.
1431121.title: The Pelekai Residence

He was well-aware of where stuff was in the house since he's been here a few times already.
